overview:
Jeremy is the founder, CEO and chief product officer of Traffek. He founded the company in 2006 with a mission of creating real world social games utilizing mobile devices. At the time, he realized that the market and technology was not ready for his vision.

In the fall of 2011, he decided the market was ready and it was time to follow his passion and put all his time and energy into turning his vision of Traffek into reality. He was able to put together a dream team of other innovative, creative and technology partners who shared his passion and experience to bring his visions to life!

Jeremy is responsible for the overall direction and product strategy for Traffek.

He is the driving force behind turning Traffek’s mission into reality which is “To make the world playable”
